title: Warranty for Pixel 2XL bought in BestBuy USA
content: My Pixel 2XL has problem witch touchscreen not responding. I tried many things including update via ADB with official OTA (locked bootloader) but it didn't help. The device was bought in BB in the USA, but I live in Europe, and my country -  Poland - doesn't have support for devices in Play Store. How can I get my device repair?
